entry.title: AB-6 (Set of 6)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Baskets
Price: 39.00

Our colorful felted bowls are perfect for storing jewelry, stationary items such as paperclips, elastic bands, tapes and more. It is functional and the colours will add happiness wherever you place it. We have played with beautiful contrasting colours to complete the set.

  • Handmade with 100% wool 
  • Handcrafted by artisans in Nepal
  • Great gift all year round

composition: 100% felted wool, a renewable material. 
care: vacuum or brush. Spot-clean with damp sponge and soap, 
or with a textile stain remover. Do not machine wash. 

dimension: ø 8" x 3.25"


Please be aware that actual colours may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.

entry.title: APH-1 (multi purpose basket)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Baskets
Price: 10.00

Offering functional and organic basket with contemporary flare. All of Hamro range are made by skilled artisans, making them more special than cheaper alternatives. Great to storage pens, accessories or simply decor your succulent plants, possibilities for storage and organizing anything. It will add a lovely and touch to your desk or table. 

  • 100% pure wool, a renewable material
  • Designed in Canada. Handmade in Nepal
  • Due to the basket being handcrafted, size and shape may vary

SIZE:  4"ht. x 4.5 cir
CARE: Spot clean with damp sponge and soap, or with a textile stain remover. Do not machine wash.
